properties.name: title
properties.description: description for the element and can be used as a hint for invalid values

properties.name: propertyForValue
properties.description: defines the property that should be used for the value

properties.name: default
properties.description: default value of the value, when it does not validate

properties.name: valueIsSet
properties.description: is true when the value is set

properties.name: _isSet
properties.description: defines whether the value is set

properties.name: type
properties.description: the type of the native input

properties.name: validationMessage
properties.description: message to set on the input to show if the input does not validate

properties.name: autoResize
properties.description: if true, the width will change when typing

properties.name: _minlengthString
properties.description: string that is used to compute the minimal width of the input

properties.name: pattern
properties.description: regular expression pattern of the input

methods.name: _attachDom
methods.description: attach dom with `delegatesFocus: true` so that the element is also focussed while its's children are too, and to autofocus to first tabable

return.desc: true, if the value is set

params.name: isSet
params.description: The function that defines if the value is set

params.name: required
params.description: if true, the value is required

return.desc: true, if the value is valid

methods.name: _computeInvalid
methods.description: defines whether the value is set

methods.name: _computeValueIsSet
methods.description: defines whether the value is set

methods.name: validate
methods.description: validates the input for iron-form

methods.name: reset
methods.description: reset the value

methods.name: _confirmInput
methods.description: update manually the value with the native input

methods.name: _updateInput
methods.description: update manually the native input with the given value

methods.name: _computeMinlengthString
methods.description: compute the minimal string the input is sized for

methods.name: resize
methods.description: called automatically when static `_minlengthString` or visibilityState changes, but can be called manually to resize the minwidth of the input, when the input is for example initially hidden

methods.name: focus
methods.description: focus the input element

methods.name: blur
methods.description: removes focus from input

methods.name: select
methods.description: selects the input text in the element, and focuses it so the user can subsequently replace the whole entry

methods.name: click
methods.description: simulates a click on the element

methods.name: setCustomValidity
methods.description: sets on the native input a validity message

methods.name: reportValidity
methods.description: reports the validity state of the native input
